org.jacp.api.component

Interface IComponent<L,A,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - defines the action listener type
    A - defines the basic action type
    M - defines the basic message type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICallbackComponent<L,A,M>, IComponentView<C,L,A,M>, IPerspective<L,A,M>, IPerspectiveView<C,L,A,M>, IStatelessCallabackComponent<L,A,M>, ISubComponent<L,A,M>, UIComponent<C,L,A,M>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AComponent, AFXComponent, AFXPerspective, AStatefulCallbackComponent, AStatelessCallbackComponent, ASubComponent

    public interface IComponent<L,A,M>
    This Interface represents a very basic component that can exists in JACP environment.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IActionListener<L,A,M> getActionListener(M message)
      Returns an action listener (for local use).
      IActionListener<L,A,M> getActionListener(java.lang.String targetId, M message)
      Returns an action listener (for global use). targetId defines the id or your receiver component
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the id of the component.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of a component.
      boolean isActive()
      Get the default active status of component.
      boolean isStarted()
      Get if component was activated, can occur if message was send before "init" message arrived.
      void setActive(boolean active)
      Set default active state of component.
      void setId(java.lang.String id)
      Deprecated. 
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Deprecated. 

    • Method Detail

      • getActionListener

        IActionListener<L,A,M> getActionListener(M message)
        Returns an action listener (for local use). Message will be send to caller component.
        Parameters:
        message - ; the initial message to be send by invoking the listener
        Returns:
        the action listener instance

      • getActionListener

        IActionListener<L,A,M> getActionListener(java.lang.String targetId,
                                       M message)
        Returns an action listener (for global use). targetId defines the id or your receiver component
        Parameters:
        message - ; the message to send to target.
        targetId - ; the targets component id.
        Returns:
        the action listener instance
